articles.content: Its WrestleMania Raw! Meaning I wrote I got a lot of recapping and reviewing to get to, so lets not waste time with the preamble. You know Claire, you know her blog. You know what to do with said blo… [+11275 chars]

articles.author: Brian Marks
articles.title: Lady Gaga seemingly brushes off Caitlyn Jenner before the Oscars in viral video - Daily Mail
articles.description: Twitter users couldn't get enough of an awkward video of Lady Gaga awkwardly explaining why she hadn't been to Caitlyn Jenner's usual Malibu Starbucks recently on Sunday.
articles.content:
Lady Gaga sent Twitter into meltdown on Sunday night as a clip of the singer appearing to brush off Caitlyn Jenner went viral.
In the video, filmed outside of Elton John AIDS Foundations 30th Annual… [+5500 chars]
